# Data Inspection

## Read in data
```{r}
DG_Boar.map <- read.table("DG_Boar.map", header = F, fill = T)
DG_Boar.ped <- read.table("DG_Boar.ped", header = F, fill = T)
DG_Pig.map <- read.table("DG_Pig.map", header = F, fill = T)
DG_Pig.ped <- read.table("DG_Pig.ped", header = F, fill = T)
```

### DG_Boar.map
```{r}
typeof(DG_Boar.map)
class(DG_Boar.map)
str(DG_Boar.map)
dim(DG_Boar.map)
```

### DG_Boar.ped
```{r}

class(DG_Boar.ped)

dim(DG_Boar.ped)
```
